concept.title: View BDD reports in Katalon TestOps

conbody.p: Katalon TestOps has dedicated support for viewing BDD test results as well as advanced analytics and reports such as Traceability Matrix Report. To learn about Traceability Matrix Report, you can refer to this document: Traceability Matrix Report.

By default, the BDD test report feature on Katalon TestOps is disabled to avoid mixing the BDD and Katalon Studio formatted data. To enable the feature, you can refer to this guide: View BDD Test Results in Katalon TestOps.
